attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am starting this petition to keep Eoghan Quigg in Ireland! Please Eoghan, don't move to England, Ireland hasn't got much celebrities/idol's and to be honest, it is amazing knowing your just a drive away...

though if you were to move to england there's that possibility we could not see you again if the worst was to happen, but we definitly would not see you as much.

Your our world, please stay? xxx

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
